title: Pharmaceutical Research Cloud Acceleration
challenge: Drug discovery workloads were bottlenecked by legacy compute infrastructure.
solution: Evasion Tech moved research workloads to AWS HPC clusters and optimized workflows with container orchestration.
detailed_solution: Evasion Tech collaborated with researchers to analyze simulation workflows and optimize them for HPC clusters. AWS ParallelCluster was leveraged to handle high-performance compute demands. Containerized workloads improved reproducibility and reduced setup times. Data pipelines were automated to accelerate dataset preparation. Visualization tools were integrated to allow near real-time insights. The overall setup drastically reduced experimentation timelines, giving researchers an edge in competitive drug discovery.
long_term_impact: Accelerated time-to-market for new drugs by nearly 1 year.
